label: def-cloning-score-function
statement:
The **Cloning Score Function**, $S: \mathbb{R}_{\ge 0} \times \mathbb{R}_{\ge 0} \to \mathbb{R}$, takes the fitness potential of a companion walker ($v_c$) and a primary walker ($v_i$) and computes a raw score.

$$
S(v_c, v_i) := \frac{v_c - v_i}{v_i + \varepsilon}
$$

where $\varepsilon > 0$ is the cloning denominator regularizer.
context: Section 16: The Cloning Transition Measure, subsection 15.1.1
